184729344.review:
It is what it is. It's a relatively fun game with easy to understand mechanics in terms of an idle game, however it's very much an active game. Sure you can idle, don't get me wrong, but there's not much in regards to automation so every time you prestige you have to do the same song and dance over and over and over again for the beginning of the game which quickly takes you out of it.

A suggestion to the creator, if they're interested in improvement rather than solely making money, is to fix this. It desperately needs it. You need to have some autobuy upgrades in the prestige shop for every single feature otherwise people will get bored. I love the concept but I can't justify playing it because it's pure tedium every time you go to reset and prestige
